ValidationRule.description: Case 331148623 -Prevent FSS changing the status on a HRS 401k opty rcd type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR($User.Job_Name__c = 'District Sales Assistant', $User.Job_Name__c = 'Zone Assistant') && $RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity Record Type' && ISCHANGED(StageName)
